00063 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00064   * @brief  Main program.
00065   * @retval None
00066   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00067 int main(void)
00068 {
00069   s32 input;
00070 
00071   NVIC_Configuration();               /* NVIC configuration                                                 */
00072   CKCU_Configuration();               /* System Related configuration                                       */
00073   GPIO_Configuration();               /* GPIO Related configuration                                         */
00074   RETARGET_Configuration();           /* Retarget Related configuration                                     */
00075 
00076   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED1);
00077   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED2);
00078   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED3);
00079   HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED1);
00080   HT32F_DVB_LEDOff(HT_LED2);
00081   HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED3);
00082 
00083   for (input = 0; input < 10; input++)
00084   {
00085     __Delay(2000000);
00086     HT32F_DVB_LEDToggle(HT_LED1);
00087     HT32F_DVB_LEDToggle(HT_LED2);
00088     HT32F_DVB_LEDToggle(HT_LED3);
00089   }
00090 
00091   for (input = 0; input < 100; input++)
00092   {
00093     printf("Hello World! %d\r\n", input);
00094   }
00095 
00096   while (1)                           /* Infinite loop                                                      */
00097   {
00098     printf("Please input key for printf....");
00099     SERIAL_Flush();
00100 
00101     input = getchar();
00102     printf("\r\nYour input is %c[0x%x]\r\n\r\n", input, input);
00103     SERIAL_Flush();
00104 
00105     HT32F_DVB_LEDToggle(HT_LED1);
00106     HT32F_DVB_LEDToggle(HT_LED2);
00107     HT32F_DVB_LEDToggle(HT_LED3);
00108   }
00109 }
00110 
00111 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00112   * @brief  Configure the NVIC vector table.
00113   * @retval None
00114   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00115 void NVIC_Configuration(void)
00116 {
00117   NVIC_SetVectorTable(NVIC_VECTTABLE_FLASH, 0x0);     /* Set the Vector Table base location at 0x00000000   */
00118 }
00119 
00120 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00121   * @brief  Configure the system clocks.
00122   * @retval None
00123   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00124 void CKCU_Configuration(void)
00125 {
00126 /*
00127 //<e0> Enable Peripheral Clock
00128 //  <h> Communication
00129 //    <q5> EBI
00130 //    <q11> I2C0   <q12> I2C1
00131 //    <q23> I2S
00132 //    <q21> SCI0 <q22> SCI1
00133 //    <q13> SPI0   <q14> SPI1
00134 //    <q17> UART0  <q18> UART1
00135 //    <q15> USART0 <q16> USART1
00136 //    <q3>  USB
00137 //  </h>
00138 //  <h> IO
00139 //    <q7> GPIO Port A <q8>  GPIO Port B <q9>  GPIO Port C <q10>  GPIO Port D
00140 //    <q19> AFIO
00141 //    <q20> EXTI
00142 //  </h>
00143 //  <h> System
00144 //    <q32> ADC
00145 //    <q4>  CKREF
00146 //    <q6>  CRC
00147 //    <q31> CMP
00148 //    <q2>  PDMA
00149 //    <q26> PWRCU
00150 //  </h>
00151 //  <h> Timer
00152 //    <q29> BFTM0 <q30> BFTM1
00153 //    <q33> SCTM0 <q34> SCTM1 <q35> SCTM2 <q36> SCTM3
00154 //    <q27> GPTM0 <q28> GPTM1
00155 //    <q24> MCTM0
00156 //    <q26> RTC   <q25> WDT
00157 //  </h>
00158 //</e>
00159 */
00160 #if 1
00161   CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00162   CKCUClock.Bit.PDMA       = 0;
00163   CKCUClock.Bit.USBD       = 0;
00164   CKCUClock.Bit.CKREF      = 0;
00165   CKCUClock.Bit.EBI        = 0;
00166   CKCUClock.Bit.CRC        = 0;
00167   CKCUClock.Bit.PA         = 0;
00168   CKCUClock.Bit.PB         = 0;
00169   CKCUClock.Bit.PC         = 0;
00170   CKCUClock.Bit.PD         = 0;
00171   CKCUClock.Bit.I2C0       = 0;
00172   CKCUClock.Bit.I2C1       = 0;
00173   CKCUClock.Bit.SPI0       = 0;
00174   CKCUClock.Bit.SPI1       = 0;
00175   CKCUClock.Bit.USART0     = 1;
00176   CKCUClock.Bit.USART1     = 1;
00177   CKCUClock.Bit.UART0      = 1;
00178   CKCUClock.Bit.UART1      = 1;
00179   CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO       = 1;
00180   CKCUClock.Bit.EXTI       = 0;
00181   CKCUClock.Bit.SCI0       = 0;
00182   CKCUClock.Bit.SCI1       = 0;
00183   CKCUClock.Bit.I2S        = 0;
00184   CKCUClock.Bit.MCTM0      = 0;
00185   CKCUClock.Bit.WDT        = 0;
00186   CKCUClock.Bit.BKP        = 0;
00187   CKCUClock.Bit.GPTM0      = 0;
00188   CKCUClock.Bit.GPTM1      = 0;
00189   CKCUClock.Bit.BFTM0      = 0;
00190   CKCUClock.Bit.BFTM1      = 0;
00191   CKCUClock.Bit.CMP        = 0;
00192   CKCUClock.Bit.ADC        = 0;
00193   CKCUClock.Bit.SCTM0      = 0;
00194   CKCUClock.Bit.SCTM1      = 0;
00195   CKCUClock.Bit.SCTM2      = 0;
00196   CKCUClock.Bit.SCTM3      = 0;
00197   CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00198 #endif
00199 
00200 #if (ENABLE_CKOUT == 1)
00201   CKOUTConfig();
00202 #endif
00203 }
00204 
00205 #if (ENABLE_CKOUT == 1)
00206 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00207   * @brief  Configure the debug output clock.
00208   * @retval None
00209   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00210 void CKOUTConfig(void)
00211 {
00212   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00213     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00214     CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO = 1;
00215     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00216   }
00217 
00218   AFIO_GPxConfig(GPIO_PA, AFIO_PIN_9, AFIO_MODE_15);
00219 
00220   { /* Configure CKOUT                                                                                      */
00221     CKCU_CKOUTInitTypeDef CKOUTInit;
00222     CKOUTInit.CKOUTSRC = CKCU_CKOUTSRC_HCLK_DIV16;
00223     CKCU_CKOUTConfig(&CKOUTInit);
00224   }
00225 }
00226 #endif
00227

00232 void GPIO_Configuration(void)
00233 {
00234   /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00235      Shall be modified according to the part number.
00236   */
00237 #if (RETARGET_PORT == RETARGET_USART0)
00238   //AFIO_GPxConfig(GPIO_PA, AFIO_PIN_2 | AFIO_PIN_3, AFIO_FUN_USART_UART);
00239 #endif
00240 
00241 #if (RETARGET_PORT == RETARGET_USART1)
00242   //AFIO_GPxConfig(GPIO_PA, AFIO_PIN_4 | AFIO_PIN_5, AFIO_FUN_USART_UART);
00243 #endif
00244 
00245 #if (RETARGET_PORT == RETARGET_UART0)
00246   //AFIO_GPxConfig(GPIO_PC, AFIO_PIN_4 | AFIO_PIN_5, AFIO_FUN_USART_UART);
00247 #endif
00248 
00249 #if (RETARGET_PORT == RETARGET_UART1)
00250   //AFIO_GPxConfig(GPIO_PC, AFIO_PIN_1 | AFIO_PIN_3, AFIO_FUN_USART_UART);
00251 #endif
00252 }

00261 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)

00270   {
00271   }

00275 /* Private functions ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00276 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00277   * @brief  delay function
00278   * @param  count: delay count for loop
00279   * @retval None
00280   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00281 static void __Delay(u32 count)
00282 {
00283   while (count--)
00284   {
00285     __NOP(); // Prevent delay loop be optimized
00286   }
00287 }
